info.author: Paul Paterson
info.description:
vb2py is a toolkit to aid in the conversion of Visual Basic projects to 
Python. The aim of the conversion is to match, as close as possible, the 
original VB applications both in terms of code behaviour and form layout. 
Version 0.2 comprises a basic layout converter (converting to PythonCard) with 
a comprehensive code translation. The project roadmap 
(http://vb2py.sourceforge.net/roadmap.htm) shows the project's development 
timeline.

Converting VB to Python turns your VB projects into cross platform 
developments and allows full access to all Python's extensive library of 
modules.
info.keywords: VB Visual Basic Code Converter PythonCard
info.name: vb2py
info.summary: Visual Basic to Python Conversion Toolkit
info.html_description:
vb2py is a toolkit to aid in the conversion of Visual Basic projects to Python. The aim of the conversion is to match, as close as possible, the original VB applications both in terms of code behaviour and form layout. Version 0.2 comprises a basic layout converter (converting to PythonCard) with a comprehensive code translation. The project roadmap (http://vb2py.sourceforge.net/roadmap.htm) shows the project’s development timeline.

Converting VB to Python turns your VB projects into cross platform developments and allows full access to all Python’s extensive library of modules.
